title: Is it me or is Ali+Targons the most obnoxious lane?
body:
I have 0 clue how to survive that lane.
ALl in him? hahaha nope
Poke him? Nope
Passively farm? Not if he doesn't want you to

replies.body: Poke him and his adc down.  I don't mean with a support.  I mean with something absurd like support {{champion:161}} , {{champion:101}}, AP {{champion:117}}   or even {{champion:99}} .  Ali can't do anything if he's out of headbutt range other than spam his heal, so you need to do more damage than he can fix.  Get a nuker and some mana pots and poke him and his adc out of lane again and again and again.  Just ward and watch your positioning so you don't get caught by the enemy jungler.

As ADC. Poke him whenever its safe to and you're out of range of his combo. That or poke the enemy ADC enough so Ali cant afford to engage.

As a Ranged Support (Thresh, Janna, Karma) Poke whenever safe and be in position to counter engage on the enemy adc when Ali goes in. 

As a Melee Support (Leona, Braum, ect) just be in position to threaten the ADC or stand in between your adc and Ali.

> [{quoted}](name=Tusutaki,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BgGwO2et,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-03T23:17:52.736+0000)

> As ADC. Poke him whenever its safe to and you're out of range of his combo. That or poke the enemy ADC enough so Ali cant afford to engage.

> As a Ranged Support (Thresh, Janna, Karma) Poke whenever safe and be in position to counter engage on the enemy adc when Ali goes in. 
> 
> As a Melee Support (Leona, Braum, ect) just be in position to threaten the ADC or stand in between your adc and Ali.

You can't poke him that hard. Between E and targons they will always have more hp, unless teh adc just isn't trading.
Thresh isn't really ranged, if he goes in for AA harass hell get harassed back and ali will heal it. 
Leona braum? Ali counters at least one of them super hard, and his adc will poke you and every trade theyll win due to crazy sustain that you can't beat.
